1.content:
Damien Doxen - A 5 year old shy and quiet Dalmatian pup. Height: 3ft.


Sam Maneson - A 6 year old adventurous lion cub. Height: 3.3 ft.


Tyrone 'Roni' Collins - A 10 year old black and white Border Collie who dabbles into science. Height: 4.5 ft.


Max Howland - A 2 year old playful gray wolf pup. Height: 2.8 ft.
1.title: Character Selection

13.content: Where does his story takes place?
13.title: Tyrone Collins

131.content:
Choose a scenario:

Surprise Package - Tyrone comes back home from school to discover a package on his porch that come from the mail sent for him even though he didn't order or ask for anything. But what is held inside is a mystery that will also change his body.

Backyard Discovery - While playing in the backyard, he discovers an object of some kind that affects his body.
131.title: At home

1313.content: The Experiment - Being the scientific pup that he is Roni has a science lab in his room with chem lab set and is able to make even remote control devices and mini ray guns out of household items and cardboard! One experiment he comes up with has strange results and side effects.
1313.title: The Experiment?

13132.content: Game Makeover - After getting a video game for cheap, he goes home to play it only to get transported into the game itself as a female character.
13132.title: Game Makeover?

131321.content:
Tyrone ‘Roni’ Collins, a black and white furred border collie with white on his forelimbs, his muzzle and chest, and the tip of his curved tail and left floppy ear, black on everything else and a bit on the pudgy side and a height of 4.5 ft.

The playful pup in his white and red sleeved shirt and brown shorts held a video game box ran through the two story house of baby blue painted walls as he passed the second eldest teen brother, Jesse, who is basically a foot and few inches taller than Roni and different fur pattern with more white than black, wearing a white jersey shirt and red gym shorts, on the red couch watching some sports game in the den.

He was however, stopped by his eldest brother and legal guardian, Cam who was six foot, slightly muscular and has blotches or patches of brown and purple in his fur. He wore a light blue polo shirt and blue jeans and was in the kitchen, preparing a pot of pasta.

“Where’s the fire, champ?”

“Oh, just got this game from a garage sale for three bucks!”

“Three dollars? Sounds like good deal.”

“Yeah, and it’s for the GameBox too! I’m gonna try it out now!”

“Okay. Have fun! Dinner will be ready in an hour, just so you know.”

“Ok!”

Roni continued up the shag carpeted stairs and went left down the hallway to the end to his bedroom with a yellow caution sigh with a bubbling beaker on the door. He opened the door to reveal a room with light blue walls, decorated with some video game and science related posters like atoms, solar systems, etc. To the right, a twin sized bed with purple covers and blanket and light wooden bedposts.

In the back, was a small table with a kid chemistry set and some cardboard gadgets in front of closet mirror. Opposite of the bed was a three-shelf dresser drawer with an entertainment system next to it. On top of the small two-tier shelving, there was a flat screen TV connecting to a DVD/Blu-Ray player on the top level with a library of movies and a gray box game console on the bottom with a library of games.

He turned on the TV and the console, then he took the game out of the box and insert it into the console, starting the game.

What kind/genre of game is it?
131321.title: Game Makeover

1313211.content: What's the name of the game?
1313211.title: Sci-Fi

1313212.content: What's the name of the game?
1313212.title: Fantasy Adventure

13132122.content:
First, the console’s company logo came on the screen before the title of the game booted up. The title screen had three weapons, a sword with a golden hilt, a silver axe, and a staff crossing and overlapping each other in front of a bronze shield. The words’ Dungeon Divers’ flashed across the screen in front of the weaponry display with a Press Start prompt beneath it.

He grabbed the controller and pressed the start, eager to get into the game.

Some game intro static scenes popped on screen telling the story about a legend of a dark overlord spreading chaos throughout the realms and in order to defeat him, a hero or heroes are chosen to find and activate four crystals sealed in dungeons that harnesses a great power.

After that, the screen went over to a few sets of menus for character building, first was choosing between male or female. He chosen male which lead to the next menu and set of choices. This time it was for character jobs/classes. There were the basics such as Warrior, Mage, Fighter, and Thief while others were a bit complex such as Barbarian, Pirate, Ninja, and Druid with their own sets of unique attacks and skills. A lot of good ones to choose from but Roni could only pick just one.

Which job/class did he pick?
13132122.title: Dungeon Divers

131321223.content: Which job/class did he pick?
131321223.title: Fighter/Thief?

1313212233.content: Which job/class did he pick?
1313212233.title: Barbarian/Pirate?

13132122333.content: Which job/class did he pick?
13132122333.title: Ninja/Druid?

131321223333.content: Which job/class did he pick?
131321223333.title: Archer/Summoner?

13132123.content: What's the name of the game?
13132123.title: Jurassic Journeys?

131321232.content: What's the name of the game?
131321232.title: Rune Raiders?

1313213.content: What kind/genre of game is it?
1313213.title: Western?

131322.content: Halloween Hi-jinx - A series of Halloween based stories that Roni gets transformed.
131322.title: Halloween Hi-jinx?

1313221.content:
Costume Conundrum - Tyrone wants a new costume for Halloween and gets one from the Costume Corral only to experience the costume's effects soon after wearing it.

Candy Coated Chaos - While Trick or Treating with friends, Roni is given a strange new kind of candy with interesting results when eaten.
1313221.title: Halloween Hi-jinx

13132211.content:
“Here we are champ.” Cam Collins said as he parked the olive-green SUV in front of an orange building in a shopping plaza, with a yellow sign that said “The Costume Corral” in green text. He was a 6ft adult twenty-something border collie with black and white fur with some purple blotches esp. over his left eye, wearing a light blue polo shirt and blue jeans.

Next to him in the passenger seat was his littlest brother, Tyrone ‘Roni’ Collins, a black and white furred border collie with white on his forelimbs, his muzzle and chest, and the tip of his curved tail and left floppy ear, black on everything else and a bit on the pudgy side and a height of 4.5 ft, wearing a white and blue striped shirt with brown shorts.

His tail wagged in anticipation as he was getting his new costume since he outgrew his last one. They exited the car and went through the sliding doors inside.

A female gray wolf with lengthy white hair dressed up in a purple witch’s outfit manned the register on the left side near the entrance. The walls fit the Halloween theme of blacks and oranges with wool spider webs and string lights hung around. There were creepy displays of various elaborate eerie décor of pumpkins, ghosts, and everything inflatable. But what was surprising how many costumes this store had, filling the shelves, pegs on the walls, racks and tables. These costumes ran the gamut from the scary and spooky to the fun and playful.

Tyrone looked around the place in bright eyed awe. So many to choose from!

“So what do you like to get Roni?” his older brother asked.

“Hmm…” the pup was in deep thought on what would he like to be for Halloween.

What kind of costume did he choose?
13132211.title: Costume Conundrum

13132211223331.content: What kind of cowboy costume?
13132211223331.title: Cowboy

13132213.content: Haunted House Havoc - While Trick or Treating, Roni and some friends explore an abandoned and supposedly haunted house only to meet up with a scary sex changing surprise.
13132213.title: Haunted House Havoc?

1313222.content: Birthday Wish Warp - It's Roni's birthday and before he blows out the candles of his birthday cake, he makes a wish about being older/bigger. It gets granted but in an odd way.
1313222.title: Birthday Wish Warp?

13132222.content: Ailment Anomaly - Roni stays home from school due to a strange sickness. The symptoms are common at first from a hot fever, coughing fits, etc. that is until his body starts to change.
13132222.title: Ailment Anomaly?

131322222.content: Girly Room Glitch - Roni wakes up one day to discover that his room has been converted into a girl's room with all his stuff gone and replaced with girly things. He thinks it is a prank done by his older brothers and tries to confront them only for them to be missing, leaving him home alone without any notice. Then, strange things start to happen as his surroundings in the house change, including himself.
131322222.title: Girly Room Glitch?

1313222222.content: Blockbusted - Similar to Game Makeover. Roni rents a DVD and is transported into the film he is watching, becoming a female lead in the process.
1313222222.title: Blockbusted?

133.content:
Choose a scenario:

Strange Shower Shenanigans - While at the beach with his two older brothers, Roni goes to the shower stalls to wash up before going into the water. However, in one of the stalls, he discovers something strange inside that eventually change his body.

Discovery Digs - With a toy bucket and shovel, Tyrone wants to dig deep in the sand and create a large hole to play in. However, his shovel struck something while digging and digs up something that affects his body.
133.title: At the beach

1331.content:
It was a clear and cloudless sunny day at an anthro beach where the surf calmly ebbed and flowed along the over two mile long shoreline. The sands had a sea of umbrellas with towels and blankets underneath and a volleyball court or two with five lifeguard posts evenly spaced and overlooking the entire area. Behind that were a bathroom/shower building and some food vendors and vending machines.

A trio of border collie brothers settled on a spot that was in between the waters and the shoreline's edge. Cam, the eldest brother who has some blotches of purple and brown along with black and white fur, wore purple swim trunks and pitched up an umbrella. Jesse, the middle athletic teen brother with mostly white fur with spots of black on his right ear and left eye, wore white swim shorts while holding a boogie board, heading towards the water. Tyrone or Roni, the youngest slightly tubby brother who had black fur mainly but had white on his forelimbs, torso, left ear tip and tail tip, wore light blue swim trunks and had a yellow inner tube around his waist.

Roni was about to follow Jesse into the water before the older brother stopped him.

"Whoa there squirt. You better take a shower first and wash up. Don't want to get your fur too tangled with salt water."

"Aww...do I have to?" Roni pouted.

His oldest brother gave him a stern look that caused a floppy ear and tail to twitch.

"Oh alright..." he said begrudgingly as he took off the inner tube and began to trek towards the restroom.

He went inside male restroom and was greeted with brown sandy tiles, white painted walls, and low hanging ceiling lights. Along the right wall there were a couple of urinals and toilets and four shower stalls with milky white shower curtains. Opposite wall had the three steel sinks with mirrors above them and an hand dryer at the end. It seemed like he was the only one there.

He headed over to the second stall, opened the curtain and stepped inside, closing it behind him. However, he noticed that something unusual was in the stall.

What did he find?
1331.title: Strange Shower Shenanigans

1333.content: Bizarre Beach Cave - While at the beach, Roni checks out a beach cave embedded in a cliff side and discovers some strange sex changing thing inside.
1333.title: Bizarre Beach Cave?

13332.content: Vending Machine Makeover - Before going to a swim, Roni decides to get a snack from a nearby vending machine that sells strange feminine products.
13332.title: Vending Machine Makeover?

135.content: Where does his story takes place?
135.title: Other

1352.content:
Choose a scenario:

Hall of Mirrors Makeover - While at the state fair carnival with his brothers, Roni ventures into a Hall of Mirrors and finds out that there is more to the mirrors maze than meets the eye.

Fem Fair Food Frenzy - The carnival provides a plethora and variety of foods to eat but the vendor that Tyrone chooses to eat from has some special/magical ingredients that changes him.
1352.title: At a carnival

1353.content: Where does his story takes place?
1353.title: At Camp?

13532.content: Where does his story takes place?
13532.title: Arcade?

15.content:
Henry Huskins - A 7 year old white and gray brave Siberian Husky pup. Height: 3.8 ft


Calvin Hobbins - A 5 year old black and orange bashful Bengal tiger cub. Height: 3.2 ft


Pete Moonlace - A 1 year old jet black wolf pup. Height: 2.4 ft


Gregg Pawstone - A 4 year old brown and blank curious German Shepherd. Height: 2.9 ft
15.title: More Characters

info.brief_description: Anthro boys turn into grown anthro women!
info.description:
Anthro boys from ages 1-10 turn into grown female anthro women and then some!

Some rules to establish

1. Age Progression and TG should be the main focus but other kinds of TF is allowed. No scat or watersports.
2. No killing or death of chars.
3. Boys ages 10 and under are only allowed to change and the main focus. Other chars can join in on the TF fun too.
4. Sex is allowed (only after the boys turn into women, no underage sex. Cub nudity is accepted though). No gays/lesbians. No herms either.
5. Have fun.
